page.title: Jet Demand, IT Propel Lockheed Profit Up
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Lockheed Martin Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=LMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">LMT.N</A>, the No. 1 U.S. defense contractor, posted a 41 percent jump in quarterly profit on Tuesday, beating Wall Street forecasts, as demand climbed for its combat aircraft and information technology services.
